general
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  general.Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a game board that is basically a matrix.

Author:
Petri Tuononen, Matej Pristak TODO: To play against AI or to debug the enemy ships could be placed using the random matrix placement.
